definitions.definition_text: to bestow, to confer (something on someone by giving an accompanying speech or short statement)
to incline, to lean, to veer, to deviate from normal direction
helping each other in some job, taking turns to help each other (especially with harvesting)

similar_words: វេរប្បដិវេរ
វេរចង្ហាន់សង្ឃ
